description: Convert a Windows ICO file to a PAM file. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/winicontopam.html.

useCases.description: Read an ICO file and convert the best quality image contained therein to the PAM format:

Convert the n'th image in the input file to PAM:
